api_list.name: getOrderById
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://firstapi116.p.rapidapi.com/store/order/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "firstapi116.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://firstapi116.p.rapidapi.com/store/order/{orderid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "firstapi116.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
